short_summary: The Department of National Defence requires spare parts for snow blowers from various suppliers. A total of 60 items are listed, including pins, washers, nuts, gaskets, and other components. The delivery location is 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec, and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta, and the expected delivery date is within 180 days of contract award. Bidders must submit their proposals by email only.
description: The solicitation document contains detailed specifications and technical requirements for each of the 60 items. The department is seeking snow blower spare parts from various suppliers, including pins, washers, nuts, gaskets, and other components. The delivery location is 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec, and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta. The department expects the selected supplier to meet the technical requirements and specifications outlined in the solicitation document. The contract will be awarded based on the bids received and the evaluation criteria outlined in the solicitation document. The contract value is not disclosed. The solicitation document contains detailed information on the evaluation criteria, bid submission process, and other relevant details.
duration_in_months: With an expected delivery completion date in approximately 180 days.
full_summary:
# Snow Blowers Spare Parts Tender Announcement
### Title: Request for Proposal
#### Date: May 24, 2023

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire Snow Blowers Spare Parts for use at 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta.

### Procurement Details
* Solicitation Number: W8476-236723/A
* Amendment Number: 4
* Tendering Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: Goods
* UNSPSC Codes: *25170000, 25172300, 25174800, 26101504, 31160000, 31162400, 31162500, 31163200, 31171900, 31400000, 40142200, 40170000, 46171602*

### Parts and Quantities Required
We are seeking the following parts and quantities:
* 46 items of spare parts for snow blowers, including but not limited to:
	+ Pins (heads and headless)
	+ Washers
	+ Nuts (plain, self-locking, hexagonal)
	+ Gaskets
	+ Hinges
	+ Clevises
	+ U-bolts
	+ Microrelays
	+ Horns
	+ Oil pump assemblies
	+ Propeller shafts with universal joints
	+ Sleeves
	+ Etc.

### Tender Requirements
* Deliveries must be made to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta within 180 days from contract award
* Bidders must provide a detailed quotation for the required parts
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process

### Submission Requirements
* Electronic submission of bids only via e-mail to [marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca)
* Bidders must provide a copy of the completed Bid Schedule (Form 4) and other required documents with their bid

### Important Dates
* Tender Closing Date: June 28, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: (To be confirmed)

### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Languages of Service
* Official languages of Canada: English and French

### Contact Information
* Contract
